transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductCategory
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDescription
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductModel
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Culture as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductModelProductDescription
ProductModelProductDescription, ProductDescription join(ProductModelProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID == ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPDandPMPD
Product, ProductCategory join(Product@ProductCategoryID == ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPandPC
ProductModel, JoinPandPC join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == Product@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPMandPPC
JoinPMandPPC, JoinPDandPMPD join(Product@ProductModelID == ProductModelProductDescription@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID = ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
		ProductCategoryID = ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductID,
		ProductCategoryID = Product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID = Product@ProductModelID,
		ModelName = ProductModel@Name,
		CatalogDescription,
		ProductName = Product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID = SellStartDate,
		SellEndDateID = SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDateID = DiscontinuedDate,
		ModifiedDateID = Product@ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryName = ProductCategory@Name,
		Culture,
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct
SelectProduct pivot(groupBy(Description),
	pivotBy(Culture),
	DescriptionCulture = max(Description),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> PivotProduct
PivotProduct derive(DescriptionCultureAr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturear    ')),
		DescriptionCultureEn = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureen    ')),
		DescriptionCultureFr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturefr    ')),
		DescriptionCultureHe = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturehe    ')),
		DescriptionCultureTh = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureth    ')),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturezh-cht'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1, SelectProduct join(PivotProduct@Description == SelectProduct@Description,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max(DescriptionCultureEn),
		{DescriptionCultureFr   } = max(DescriptionCultureFr),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProdDesc
AggProdDesc, SelectProduct join(AggProdDesc@ProductID == SelectProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = SelectProduct@ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		{DescriptionCultureEn    },
		{DescriptionCultureFr   },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht},
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		ProductCategoryName,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID,
		SellEndDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max({DescriptionCultureEn    }),
		{DescriptionCultureFr    } = max({DescriptionCultureFr   }),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> Aggregate1
JoinPandPC sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sink1
